author: cbs8
title: Statement regarding the Status of Contract Talks between FCA US LLC and the UAW
text:
FCA US LLC
AUBURN HILLS, Mich. , Sept. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- FCA US LLC confirms that it has been selected as the company to set pattern on a collective bargaining agreement with the UAW. As negotiations are ongoing, the Company can offer no further comment at this time.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/statement-regarding-the-status-of-contract-talks-between-fca-us-llc-and-the-uaw-300141988.html
